title: Release asset
description: A file associated with a release.

index.description: Unique identifier of the release asset.

name.description: The name of the release asset.

content_type.description: The content type of the release asset (application/zip, etc.).

size.description: Size in bytes of the release asset.

download_count.description: The number of times the release asset was downloaded.

download_url.description: The URL from which the release asset can be downloaded.
